entry.title: Speaker Deck: Rubyconf Brazil 2012
entry.content:
A retrospective of problematic projects (Rubyconf Brazil 2012)

I checked out this presentation on Speaker Deck by Daniel Lopes.

Topics Touched on in the Presentation:

+Best Practices
+SCRUM
+Rails Best Practices
+Control Levels:
+Individual
+Team
+Outside of Control
+DRY & Automation
+Creation –> Launch –> Maintenance
+Automated Tests
+What Should I Test?
+Agile
